plant.name: StereoCollapse
plant.cabbagecode: image $INVIS bounds(0, 0, 100, 18) { button $HG_BTN pos(0, 2), size(20, 14), channel("mono-st"), radiogroup("Collapse"),value(1), text("St", "St"), popuptext("Stereo Input") button $HG_BTN pos(20, 2), size(22, 14), channel("mono-inv"), radiogroup("Collapse"), text("Inv", "Inv"), popuptext("Inverted Stereo Input") button $HR_BTN pos(42, 2), size(20, 14), channel("mono-lr"), radiogroup("Collapse"), text("LR", "LR"), popuptext("Mono Input: LR+LR") button $HR_BTN pos(61, 2), size(19, 14), channel("mono-l"), radiogroup("Collapse"), text("L", "L"), popuptext("Mono Input: L+L") button $HR_BTN pos(80, 2), size(19, 14), channel("mono-r"), radiogroup("Collapse"), text("R", "R"), popuptext("Mono Input: R+R") }
plant.help: This is temporary text... where does this get used?
